name: HellCrunch
description: HellCrunch is a First Person Shooter with a focus on run and gun gameplay inspired by 1990s classics. Battle against demonic hordes as you fight your way through a series of sci-fi, fantasy, and horror environments, while racing to uncover the mystery behind their mysterious leader!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64 Bit) Processor: 2.9 GHz Dual-Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD Graphics or Equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64 Bit) Processor: 3.3 GHz Quad-Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon 6900 Or Equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
